website_summaries.verdict: These glamorous heels make a statement; they’re the perfect choice for a bride looking to go all out on her big day.
pros: We love these shoes, complete with glitter heels, bow ties around the ankles, and comfortable 4” heels
Sparkles  don’t shed, and the shoe comes in two different color options
These bridal shoes fit true to size
cons: Ankle wrap may be too large for those with slim ankles

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint hearted
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you are standing on your tip toes. Not a shoe I could handle. Also, the glitter can come off, which may be fine for some but not for others, just thought I would add that. Definitely a pretty shoe, and it looks good on... if you are pro status with heels, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Bri H.

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Cinderella! They are stunning!
customer_reviews.text: They are more than I ever wished for. Being a women's size 12 I get disappointed with fit alot because I can rarely go up a size. They sparkles don't "shed" & the fit is comfortable. They are really more stunning in person. I ordered in silver,if the champagne came in size 12 I'd buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: omg shews
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit of this shoe is fantastic! They're also incredibly comfortable and am looking forward to wearing them at my wedding! Few notes though: the front of the shoe is quite narrow and the back is a little wider Also, the ribbon is a bit cheap looking but is easily replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Esquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Fab U Luscious!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow!!! Amazingly comfortable considering the height of the heel and fierce stiletto. I have arthritis in both my big toes and was considering this New Year's Eve a "last hurrah" for shoes like this... nope! I can actually wear these again! Complements galore - from the guys and gals!!
customer_reviews.author: jjan

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, attention grabbing!
customer_reviews.text: These heels are gorgeous! Wore them to a wedding and after a couple hours of non stop standing the balls of my feet ached. Worth the pain in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Serious Cinderella Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I AM OBSESSED WITH THESE SHOES. I have long toes, which is the natural enemy of pointy-toed shoes. I also have semi-wide feet, which is the natural enemy of brand-name AND point toed shoes. However. These are surprisingly not a total nightmare! I won't say they're the most comfortable shoes I've ever put on my feet, because let's be real - they're over 4" and have no platform in the front. If you're used to this, then I'm sure you'll have no problem! But...they are GORGEOUS. I cannot even tell you how many people stopped me at my dress fitting just to comment on the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most beautiful shoes to ever exist. They were actually "comfortable" (meaning I didn't get blisters but my feet hurt as normal by the end of the night). I got compliments on them all night. Perfect addition to my black dress to dress it up!
customer_reviews.author: ShortandSweet

customer_reviews.title: Painful but pretty
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so beautiful - but so incredibly uncomfortable. I wear heels daily - usually between 3-4 inches and walk around at work all day, so I thought a little bit higher would be fine for a special occasion day - like my wedding. Unfortunately - these are not my Cinderella shoes because they were so tight in the toe box with absolutely no cushion to the balls of my feet - I was stumbling around in pain after only a few minutes of trying them out at home. They are gorgeous but not worth the pain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea Heier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting shoes to go with my wedding dress that would really pop. These definitely do the trick. I got the silver ones and they are gorgeous. The heels are high, but not ridiculously so. If you have experience walking in heels like I do these are no problem. I was afraid since they are a pointed toe, that maybe it would look weird with my wide feet, but this is not the case. I ordered a 9.5 and they fit wonderfully. I can't wait to show them off at my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The glitter looks like it may rub off butt it has held up ...
customer_reviews.text: The glitter looks like it may rub off butt it has held up well to my four year old son marveling over how much they look like Cinderella's slippers. The heal part is pretty slippery and if you aren't used to walking in such high heals it can be a bit difficult to look graceful. The ribbon is removable and can be replaced as needed. I cannot wait to wear these on my wedding day.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedding Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter's wedding. They looked just they are shown in the picture and I think my daughter nearly cried when they arrived. She tried them on and they had a great fit. She looked beautiful in them on her wedding day. Thank you for making them affordable in order for us to get them for her.
customer_reviews.author: Rene J.

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with these shoes! I was nervous at first to order heels offline, because my feet and heels normally don't work together. But I normally wear a 7 1/2 and that is what I ordered in these heels. They fit perfectly and the color is beautiful! I was worried they would be pink, but they definitely are not. They are a true champagne gold color and they are gorgeous! Perfect shoe for my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: A. Goudreau

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! Ordered a 6.5 but it was kind of big in the heel, especially on my left foot which is my smaller foot, so I ordered a 6. The six was too small in the toe box and squished my toes in a way that all of my weight was on the part of the ball of my foot that is under my big toe. I have decided to keep the 6.5 and will just add a sole insert and hope that takes care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix87

customer_reviews.title: Pain is Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful shoe that fits the saying: “Pain is beauty”. The heel area is too narrow so you’ll need to put a bandaid just about your heel to minimize friction. Toe area is tight! But I feel like Cinderella in these shoes so big plus there.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5.0

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I've seriously never been so excited to order a pair of shoes. These are beautiful!! They remind me of Cinderella's slippers. The heel is high, but I'm used to walking in high heels so these aren't uncomfortable for me to walk in. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because they do run a little big. I normally wear a 7.5 but these were too big on me, so I reordered them in a size 7. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size and looks like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Fit perfectly. I am a true size 8, but when I by pointed heels I usually get a size or half size up. Did not need to with these. The 8 fit perfectly. I have skinny ankles so there is a half inch gap around the ankle ties but its fine since I'm wearing under my wedding dress and the shoe is still supportive.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roy

customer_reviews.title: Chic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so chic! I have narrow feet, so they fit well, but I also feel like they would fit a medium width foot as well. The glitter doesn't fall off either. The strap is adjustable, so you can fit it to the size of your ankle. I just couldn't stop looking at my feet when I had these on. I received so many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: EloiseMarie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but I wore them for a wedding and the entire time I felt like I was going to fall forward. I’ve worn 4-6inch heels for a while but these were not worth the money for the lack of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Like fall off of your feet when you walk
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these while they were on sale and stash them away for my wedding this year. I ordered my usual size of 8 and a half.They got here today and are WAY too big. Like fall off of your feet when you walk, too big. I am returning and ordering the next size down hopefully it works out this time as I am really in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith-Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Day Ready
customer_reviews.text: I always order my heels a half a size smaller than my typical shoe size, and when I did, these fit as expected. Never mind the fit, though, these shoes are gorgeous! I would’ve found a way to make them work regardless. I’m tempted to buy them in the other color, too, just because.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely582

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great for my wedding. They are definitely pretty, but that is about all they have going on for them. They are incredibly uncomfortable. I was dying in them just standing trying on my dress. I have tried many other shoes by this brand and all are equally pretty, but equally uncomfortable. I lasted about 10 minutes in them, but my feet looked great for those 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT WEAR HIGH HEELS. But a special occasion made me rethink heels, and these are great. I bought the same size I generally wear in tennis shoes they fit perfectly. I was worried the ankle ribbon closure wouldn’t be sufficient but it’s just right and looks pretty. Not too tall of a heel for those of us who are used to flats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Beautiful, aching feet!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Felt like Cinderella. I received many compliments. As suspected meant to look good but not much else. Wore to a formal event. At the end of the night could barely walk to my car. My feet ached for a few days. I did not even attempt to dance in these shoes. They were a little big in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: DFoster

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! I am so in love!!!!! Was hesitant because I have a wide foot but read the reviews! I wear an 8W and ordered an 8. They fit like Cinderella!!! So in love!!!! perfect for my wedding day!!! :) PS. Saved over $20 by ordering them off Amazon as opposed to the normal website! Sorry I couldn't take a better picture. They are GORGEOUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These were adorable and I absolutely loved them! I couldn't keep them because they didn't match the dress I needed them for. The fit was great and the sparkles were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Shoes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these shoes for my fiancé for our wedding. They are absolutely stunning. The detail and sparkles look amazing and stay on really well. They were the right amount of class and glamour that she wanted. She hiked all around in them for our bridal pictures and didn't complain about them hurting. The tie on the front really helps them stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Bens

customer_reviews.title: but I fell in love with these months ago and hard a hard time ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous about buying shoes online, especially considering they're for my wedding, but I fell in love with these months ago and hard a hard time finding them in silver. I have wide feet so I was super concerned about not being able to try them on. They fit really well and while I haven't worn them for longer than a few minutes yet, I'm really pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I usally order a size 5 but I chose to order a 5 1/2 incase my feet swell a bit from standing and dancing. I probably didn't need too since now they are just a bit big but I kept them anyway. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!  BEAUUUUTIFUL SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my bridesmaids. THEY ARE FABULOUS!!!!! They look good on every kind of foot (flat, little, big, even swollen!) They all say they are comfortable even though a couple don't wear heels. They are a rose gold on the side trim and the sparkley part is more in the pink family. Their dresses are plum and this was the perfect color to bring everything together with the jewelry, dresses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love these heels! Bought these to wear to a holiday party this Christmas. Unfortunately I ordered the wrong size and have to return them, but I'm ordering a smaller pair and cant wait til they arrive. It is a 4" heel which is a little more than what I normally wear but they are surprisingly easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is pain
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooo cute but way uncomfortable, I ordered for my wedding day and had cuts on my heels after wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size down BUT BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my wedding next summer. I ordered a soe 7 1/2 my usual size in almost every shoe and they were huge. So they sent me a size seven right away. I still have to return the 71/2. But they box is to die the details are everything and more. Like I have a kind of wide foot too but they fit great. I’ll for sure wear them for the first half of my wedding! Can’t wait Cinderella perfect
customer_reviews.author: Candace Chambers

customer_reviews.title: It is so much prettier in person and it sparkles like no other
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a lovely shoe!! It is so much prettier in person and it sparkles like no other! I can't wait to wear it on my wedding day in a month! and it is also soooo comfortable, I feel like I can dance all night in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylon Garrett

customer_reviews.title: They are not comfortable but I didn't expect them to be
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look just as they do online and are gorgeous. They are a bit taller than I expected, closer to 4.5" than 4". They are not comfortable but I didn't expect them to be. They are beautiful, high-quality shoes and that is why they receive 5 stars. I am so excited to wear them on my wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are beautiful, but I have a tiny and skinny foot
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful, but I have a tiny and skinny foot. Even at size 5, it was small. Also, the palm of my foot hurt within the first 30 min of wearing these since they are so tall and does not have enough padding on the bottom. Beautiful but will hurt to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Very special occassion shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had no real reason to purchase these besides they are gorgeous and they were very reasonably priced🤷🏽‍♀️. If I ever get married these will be my wedding shoes. They are quite comfy despite the skinny heel.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable, but can become loose if you're wearing them ...
customer_reviews.text: A hit at the party! Quite comfortable, but can become loose if you're wearing them for a while. The sequin can get stuck/caught on your dress if wearing a long dress and depends on the material, but definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for your wedding day!
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute at my wedding! Very well built. I am a very tiny human and I read that these are not good for tiny ankles but I couldn't disagree more. They are SO COMFORTABLE . I wore them my ENTIRE WEDDING and it was outdoors in the dirt. I adore these and1000% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for my wedding and they are beautiful! The sparkly silver matched my brooch bouquet perfectly! The Blue bottoms are very elegant and for for a queen.....They were my something blue!! Fits true to size. I got lots of compliments! As with any tall heel.... after hours of wear, walking and taking pictures, my feet began to hurt. But again, that is to be expected with any heel. I give these 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: KRobin

customer_reviews.title: good and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and they are very comfortable fit for my feet 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful the glitter doesn’t come off
customer_reviews.text: I bough this shoe for my wedding and let’s just say the sole won me over It’s like a light teal 🥰😍
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the event I got them for. Took some breaking in and a set of those gel ball of foot cushions. Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drop Dead Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly cute and stylish! Perfect for a special event, or even just to jazz up some jeans. So pretty and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful shoe! But just as gorgeous as it is it is just as uncomfortable! I wear heels and can walk in heels all day, this shoe was very tough to beat after two hours at a wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roxy

customer_reviews.title: They're just so pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: These Cinderella shoes will take your breath away! As comfy as a 4 inch heel can be but soooo pretty. They are about a half size too big, originally ordered a 7.5 but exchanged for a 7 and they are perfection. Going down a half size reduced the toe cleavage and made the shoe feel super secure on my foot. I cannot wait to wear these.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is for my wedding and it is all I imagined and more. The heel does feel a little higher than it looks in the picture, but that just means Ill have to wear it a little before the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are a must have!
customer_reviews.text: These pumps rock! I bought them for New Years and I cannot wait to wear them again! I wear a 7.5 and they fit perfect. True to size. These shoes are quaility. They are a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful quality. As Elle Woods would say... "too perfect for words". I'll be very happy to walk down the isle in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I bought for my wedding in October. So far the glitter has stayed in tacked. I've walked around in them to get used to them and so far they have not hurt my feet. Would like to add that they do run bigger. I'm normally a 7 1/2 and I got a 7 which they fit perfect and still have a little wiggle room. Over all I'm amazed with these shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Got them for New Years Eve and they are perfect and actually very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Holy Moly these shoes are crazy cute!!! Got them for New Years Eve and they are perfect and actually very comfortable! Looking forward to rocking these into 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Amrita Pleli

customer_reviews.title: Glitter size
customer_reviews.text: They weee amazing - the glitter can snag or stick to delicate dress fabric if you are wear with a floor length gown or wedding dress. One of the shoes was slightly bigger in the ankle area which was unfortunate and made it a bit difficult to walk. Other than that loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Marie Shobe

customer_reviews.title: Might have to re-order size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I might re-order the shows in a half size smaller. I always wear size 7.5 but my feet contiuned to move out of the shoe. Beautiful pair of shoes expectally for events or wedding day.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Day Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for my wedding shoes, they were perfect and people will think I'm lying but actually pretty comfortable! I wore them to all my bridal showers to break them in before the big day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large. I’m a true 7.5 and they are a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Juana Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable heels EVER
customer_reviews.text: This pair of heels are pretty to look at and that's the end of it. They were so uncomfortable I had to take them off after a minute. The shoe was the right size but it still squeezed my toes terribly. Highly recommend to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bloomings4

customer_reviews.title: but they looked so fabulous and perfect with my dress
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for my wedding, and they made for gorgeous photos. They hurt a bit after about half a day of wear, but they looked so fabulous and perfect with my dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shoes can’t wait to wear them for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Happy I bought them. Heel is pretty skinny and shoe is a little slippery on the bottom. Need to put some grippers on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my niece for her wedding day. Perfect and Beautiful. They looked great and must have been reasonably comfortable as she wore them the entire evening.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They are true to size and fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are true to size and fit really well. Heel is about 4" not too high. The glitter doesn't fall off so they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bradu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes - picture does not do it justice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes - picture does not do it justice. I purchased them for my daughter and they looked amazing with her wedding dress. She also said that they were extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Too big but only because I ordered a half size too big. Usually heals run small but these are sized correctly. Many many compliments on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mehauger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes, but when I thought I was getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes, but when I thought I was getting a champagne colored shoe, the bow is pink. The only reason why I returned the shoes is because of the pink bow and tones of the shoe. Would recommend if that's what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dori L

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!! They are not the most comfortable shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!! They are not the most comfortable shoes (I am also not used to wearing heels all the time) but I LOVE them! I cannot wait to wear them on my wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Better in person!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful! The picture does not do justice - better in person! The heel is a little higher than I wanted but not too high! Can’t wait for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: kallen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! By far the most beautify shoes I ...
customer_reviews.text: AHHHHHH!!!! I LOVE THESE! By far the most beautify shoes I own. I am a seasoned high heel wearer, but even so, these are quite tall. I'll practice a bit so I don't face plant on my wedding day. I LOVE THESE.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rockel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous details but they were a little hard to walk in (and I love 4in heels) and ran too big. I normally wear an 8.5 and this felt like a 9-9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Dream shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a dream! I ordered my usual size and they fit perfectly. The heel is about 3 inches and I would say they're easy to walk, dance, and twirl in. I can't wait to wear these for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: michael pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, beautiful shoe. Can't wait to wear them for my wedding. I haven't walked around too much yet to find out how they feel but when I first put them on they fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They're very cute but the piping along the edges doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: They're very cute but the piping along the edges doesn't have any give and there was little to no padding in the sole, unlike another design in the same line as these shoes. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Fussell

customer_reviews.title: These are ADORABLE! A little big I should have got a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ADORABLE! A little big I should have got a 6.5. I normally wear a 7 in tennis shoes. I’ll probably add some padding to make them a little more comfortable. The only thing I WISH was the heel to be a little shorter. These are going to take practice so I don’t break my neck. They feel higher than 3”. Also, the glitter does NOT Come off! Nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about how these look. They are gonna be perfect for my wedding. They fit nicely. I hope that they are comfortable after wearing them for a while.😆
customer_reviews.author: inspirhational

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly wait to wear for my wedding!
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a pair at Macy's but they were out of my size. Fit as expected and will keep.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaKitties

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes and not too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are everything I expected. The fit is normal and once you get used to the heel height, they really are not all that uncomfortable. These will be perfect for my wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wedding and was not disappointed! Can't wait to dance the night away!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews before ordering and I did order a half size down from normal. They fit perfectly. So amazing and gorgeous for the gala I went to.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I ordered a size 7, they fit perfectly. They are beautiful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not woth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run larger than expected, even if you use the provided sizing chart. Now it's been going on about two months trying to return the shoes with no refund still. Worst experience ever. I would recommend just going to a store
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!!! Also sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: I give these a five because I got exactly what I ordered minis the extra pair almost identical I ordered on accident. I will say I would suggest a slim foot for obvious reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very PRetty
customer_reviews.text: Christmas surprise for my wife, she loves them. They are gorgeous shoes, she says they are comfortable. They look great and run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: wjg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Have been thinking about these shoes for a very long time and finally ordered them for a holiday party. They fit great and not too bad on the feet ! Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe! Great quality They are very high
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! Great quality They are very high, kinda feel like you're walking on your tip toes but they are definitely worth it. Fits true to size
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: When the shoes came not only did they look as though they had been worn, the back of one was stitched together oddly. When I contacted customer service I was told they couldn’t send me another pair. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Can’t wait to wear these at my wedding! I’m usually a size 8, but had to order an 8.5 since they never restock. They are slightly big but will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jess.burnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super gorgeous shoes!! I got so many compliments. I definitely recommend these. They’re also pretty comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shows. Fit as expected. Classy. Perfect heel height.
customer_reviews.author: JeannaD

customer_reviews.title: Fits as sized.
customer_reviews.text: Item is in amazing shape and fits well. I have wide feet and they aren't too small anywhere purchased my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They are just gorgeous. I couldn’t believe how comfortable, stable, and easy to walk in they were for the height of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but rather uncomfortable and unrealistic to walk in for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love Betsey Johnson and sparkles so these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest shoes in my closet! Love Betsey Johnson and sparkles so these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE the shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the shoe! Was not uncomfortable, sadly I ordered the wrong color and wasn’t able to get my hands on the champagne. Great shoe! Very stylish and would totally re order if available.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Leon Vargas

customer_reviews.title: (It's a comfortable fit, I'm just not used to wearing heels ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are even prettier in person. I ordered them for my wedding and have a couple of months to get used the height. (It's a comfortable fit, I'm just not used to wearing heels anymore, so I have to re-train my feet :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hein

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for my wedding! Gorgeous and matched my dress perfectly. Love love love Betsey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wore them around the house and they felt fine but when i wore them during my last fiting ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore them around the house and they felt fine but when i wore them during my last fiting my feet hurt so bad i had to go buy a new pair of an entirely different shoe since i can not return these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Long

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! True to size! I got married in these beautiful heels. Received so many compliments for this. Although heel height is high, it was comfortable! I stood in these heels for 10 hours on my wedding day and it didn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: moony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my wedding and they exceeded my expectations! The moment I put them on, I was shocked at how comfortable they were and how well they fit. They really run true-to-size, in my opinion. The glitter is well-done and secure; it does not flake off or leave glitter behind. I am also very pleased with how sexy Betsey Johnson is able to make a 4-inch heel appear (I am always skeptical of lower heel heights). I was a bit worried the glitter would be somewhat on the dark side for wearing with a wedding dress, but when I had them on together, it looked wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: SomnioAmo

customer_reviews.title: Overall the shoes are beautiful and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am size 8 but these came rather large, so ended up ordering 7.5, they fit. Overall the shoes are beautiful and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. My daughter wore them to her prom. She did not have any issues with them. She said her feet did not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Guru

customer_reviews.title: they are super shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wedding, run a little big but it was ok because you can tie them, they are super shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkyjenn1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable shoes but quite high heel
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful, as I expected and very comfortable. The heel is quite high. The standard American size 8 corresponds to the Polish 38 (maybe even 38.5).
customer_reviews.author: Wioleta Szczygielska

product_meta.title: Blue by Betsey Johnson Women's Stela Dress Pump
product_meta.description:
Feminine glitter heelwith bow tie around ankle

New York designer Betsey Johnson has built her long-standing career in fashion by following her own set of rules. Known for her celebration of the exuberant, the embelished, and the over the top, Betsey has been rocking the fashion industry with her unique and original designs since the 1960's. Betsey Johnson, both the woman and the label, is constantly moving forward and continues to keep a strong foothold in the fashion industry with no signs of letting up anytime soon. Her love of detail and design is evident in everything she does in life and in business. Her enthusiasm, creativity and boundless talent that have kept her at the forefront of fashion for the past 40 years will keep Betsey going for years to come.
feature_bullets: Two-piece pump featuring mesh upper with glitter overlays
